attributes.action: Give Murray Walker (the voice of motorsport) a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Murray Walker has been the face and voice of motorsport over the last 50 odd years. He has been the reason so many have watched the sports he commentates on. He is one of the most well known commentators in british sport over the last 50+ years and i can not understand why that legend is not yet Sir Murray. What does he have to do to get this honour?!?!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
